title: Shobhikhan_007
author: Shobhikhan_007
content: Hi, what are your thoughts about prosper. Currently it's trading 0.57$. It's a something related to crosschain predictions market platform. Is this have a good future?

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Perhaps there is potential for growth, given that the project is presented on many exchanges, which means there are no problems with liquidity. It is unknown whether it can make a new ATH in the future, but it has a good opportunity to grow from the current values several times, especially now the price is at its lowest values. Not investment advice, just my thoughts, as always, DYOR.
